nodes.text: "Smooth" Banjaxx Wab was a Bith musician during the Galactic Civil War. He was a kloo horn player and leader of Teemo the Hutt's house band, "Smooth" Banjaxx Wab and the Scundereds.
He also regularly gave recitals at Jabba Desilijic Tiure's Palace and spied on Jabba at the request of Teemo.
